about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with a set of rare items and an exclusive Golden Epic for Baenarall, Angel of Hope. Unlock her if you don't already have her. Plus we'll also throw in 3000 Common Crafting Materials!


This pack includes:
  • Baenarall, Angel of Hope (if you don't already own her)
  • The Upvoting Mace of Ancient Hatred (Golden Epic)
  • Two other Rare items for Baenarall, Angel of Hope
  • 3000 Common Crafting Materials
